description technical detail:
Viewsonic VG2437MC-LED 23.6 Full HD DVI Display Port Height Adjust Monitor
The ViewSonicVG2437mc-LED Full HD ergonomic display is the ideal video conferencing solution with integrated 2-megapixel webcam, MIC and speakers. The 1080p LED panel provides an incredibly sharp picture and stunning video playback in full HD with a 20000000: 1 MEGA Dynamic contrast ratio. It is easy and flexible connectivity with DisplayPort, DVI, VGA, and 2-port USB hub for transferring files and attaching peripherals. The VG2437mc-LED is perfect for any workplace or classroom environment, with a highly ergonomic design engineered to maximize comfort and productivity.
